text: Privacy Policy
Update date: August 01, 2022
Effective date: August 01, 2022
introduction

Beijing Cali Technology Co., Ltd. and affiliated companies (hereinafter referred to as "Keep APP" or "We") attach great importance to your personal information and allow you to control your personal information. We will use strong encryption technology to protect your privacy.At the same time, strict policies are formulated to manage all data.
When you access the KEEP APP or use the services we provide, you need to agree with the regulations on how we collect, use, store, and share your relevant information in this policy.
If you do not agree with any content in this privacy policy, stop using or accessing our products and services immediately.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: If you do not agree with this privacy policy, stop using or accessing our products and services immediately.

text: If you have any questions about this policy, please contact: Feedback@keep.com, we will complete the verification and processing within 15, and complete the inspection and processing within 15.
label: Important
Contact Information
rewrite: Email: feedback@keep.com

text: about Us
The operators of Keep webpages and apps are Beijing Cali Technology Co., Ltd. or its affiliates.
The registered address is the No. 1 section number VIII, No. 031, and Room 032, 1st floor of Wangjing Street, Chaoyang District, Beijing.
The main points of this privacy policy are as follows:

i. We will explain the types of your personal information and its corresponding purposes we collected one by one, so that you can understand the category, use reasons and collection methods we collected for a specific function.

II., When you use some functions, we will collect some of your sensitive information after obtaining your separate consent. Unless you must collect it in accordance with the requirements of relevant laws and regulations, it will only make you unable to use the relevant features.But it does not affect your normal use, Keep, APP, other functions.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Risk
rewrite: We will collect some of your sensitive information and refuse to provide it that may make you unable to use relevant features.

text: III., At present, Keep, APP, will not actively share or transfer your personal information to, key, app, third parties outside, such as other sharing or transfer your personal information or you need us to share your personal information sharingOr transfer to, Keep, APP, and third -party situations outside, we will directly or confirm that third parties obtain your separate consent of the above behavior. In addition, we will evaluate the risk of providing information to the outside world.

Important
rewrite: The Keep App will not actively share or transfer your personal information to a third party outside the Keep APP. If the sharing will obtain your consent, we will provide information on the outside of the outside world.

text: IV. You can access, correct, and delete your personal information through this guide. You can also withdraw your consent, cancel account number, complaint reports, and set privacy functions.
label: Important
Edit/Control

1. How do we collect and use your personal information
When we provide services, we will collect and use your personal information based on the goals described in this policy based on the goals described in this policy.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Data Security
Usage
rewrite: We will collect and use your personal information based on the goals described in this policy based on the purpose of legitimate, legal, transparent, and minimum necessary.

text: 1. Basic business functional services
The basic business functions of this application are free training courses that can be used indoors. You can use this basic functional service without providing us with any personal information.
2. Upgrade experience service service
The upgrade experience function of this application is member courses, paid training courses, smart hardware proper courses, training camp courses, and intelligent training programs.
3. Extended functional services
The expansion function of this application is running, cycling, walking, community, dietary tools, body testing, malls, members, smart hardware, keepland, on -site activities related functions.

In order to provide you with better products and intelligent services, when you use experience or expansion functional services, we may need to collect the following information from you. If you refuse to provide it, you will not be able to enjoy the corresponding functions and services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In order to provide better services, we may need to collect relevant information. If you refuse to provide, you will not be able to enjoy the corresponding functions and services.

You can buy product services in Keep APP (including Keep member services, Keep paid training plan services, Keep private courses).

text: We will be regarded as non -personal information collected through cookies and other technologies.
We use cookies and similar technologies to achieve the following functions or services:
1. Ensure the safety and efficient operation of products and services

We may set up Cookie or anonymous identifier that guarantees security and ensure security, so that we can confirm whether you log in to the service safely, or whether you encounter illegal behaviors such as stolen or fraud.

2. Help you get a easier access experience
Using this kind of technology can help you save the steps and processes of personal information and enter search content, such as achieving one -click login process and recording search history.

Eleven, how to contact us
You can contact us in the following way:
1. If you have any questions, opinions or suggestions on the content of this policy, you can contact us through the Keep app online customer service;

text: Twelve, Affiliated

If any court with jurisdiction rules or judge any terms of this policy invalid, this clause will be removed from this policy, but the invalidation of this clause will not affect the effectiveness of the other terms of this policy.
